actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a Congressional Research Service legislative attorney in James B. Smith, et al. v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue, No. 3778-89 (T.C.).

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent John R. Luckey, a Congressional Research Service legislative attorney at the Library of Congress, in the case of James B. Smith, et al. v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a Congressional Research Service legislative attorney in James B. Smith, et al. v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue, No. 3778-89 (T.C.).
